remarks: Lemma for ~ esummulc2 and co.  Composing with a continuous function preserves extended sums (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
esumcocn.j $e |- J = ( ( ordTop ` <_ ) |`t ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumcocn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
esumcocn.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumcocn.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( J Cn J ) ) $.
esumcocn.0 $e |- ( ph -> ( C ` 0 ) = 0 ) $.
esumcocn.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) /\ y e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) -> ( C ` ( x +e y ) ) = ( ( C ` x ) +e ( C ` y ) ) ) $.
esumcocn $p |- ( ph -> ( C ` sum* k e. A B ) = sum* k e. A ( C ` B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k x y $.

$d k ph x y $.
